menu.name: Polishings Config
menu.desc: Adds an awesome score text and timebar, all configurable btw.

checkbox.name: Show Misses
checkbox.desc: When checked, this will show the misses and the current FC rating.

checkbox.name: Show Accuracy
checkbox.desc: When checked, this will show the accuracy and the current letter rating.

checkbox.name: Show Score
checkbox.desc: When checked, this will show the score and the current score multiplier, if you have that enabled.

checkbox.name: Time Bar Visibility
checkbox.desc: When checked, this will make the Time Bar visible.

checkbox.name: Score Multiplier
checkbox.desc: When checked, this will enable the score multiplier, describable as "Combo-based exponental score", or whatever fancy name you wanna use!

number.name: Time Bar Size
number.desc: The size multiplier of the time bar. Lower = Smaller

number.name: Score Text Size
number.desc: The font size of the text, this also affects the time bar. Lower = Smaller

checkbox.name: Animate Text
checkbox.desc: When checked, this will animate the text, disable if you no likey!
